davidoberg.comment:
Having carefully considered the thorough discussions revolving around COVID-19 mitigation strategies, particularly emphasizing inclusive practices respecting varying student requirements, I firmly conclude mandating masks indoors aligns most closely with promoting collective responsibility protecting vulnerable populations present amongst ACPS community constituents.
This stance acknowledges concerns voiced regarding accessibility hurdles possibly exacerbated without adaptable alternatives provided concurrently targeting equal opportunity guarantees upheld
